private generateId(url: string): string {

     6â†’## Architecture Overview
     7â†’The storage module provides a Neo4j-based persistence layer that transforms the research system from in-memory data structures to a persistent, queryable knowledge graph. This enables semantic search, relationship traversal, and graph analytics.

    90â†’## Key Patterns
